summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2605 for the improvement of the alley between Third Avenue South and Fourth Avenue South, from Washington Street to Main Street, in the City of Seattle, by repairing the wooden bridge and the construction of wood railing under Ordinance No. 30434, and levying and assessing the amount therefore against several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown in said roll and establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
